Package xstampp.ui.menu.file.commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutHandler
    Handler for displaying the about dialog
    CommandState
    Class that stores whether the save menu should be enabled or not
    Delete
    This handler manages the deletfor all projects and plugins on that platform by calling ProjectManager.removeProjectData(UUID) with the current project selection
    ExitApplication
    Handler which closes the application
    ExpandHandler  
    Import
    Handler that loads a analysis from the file system
    OpenStepEditor  
    OpenWizardHandler
    this hander provides a command that opens a wizard by its id given in the plugin.xml and passed in the parameter xstampp.commandParameter.openwizard
    Preferences
    Execute the preference page dialog.
    RenameCommand
    opens a rename dialoge and calls the function ProjectManager.renameProject(UUID, String)
    Save
    Handler that saves the analysis to the last location on runtime
    SaveAll
    this handler simply passes the call to ProjectManager.saveAllDataModels()
    SaveAs
    Handler that asks for the location of the file and stores them afterwards
    SwitchWorkspaceCommand
    this handler sets IPreferenceConstants.WS_REMEMBER and restarts the Platform causing the system to ask for the prefered workspace on startup
    ToWorkbenchHandler
    this handler is only called the first time when the user starts in the welcome screen this handler is called to switch between welcome perspective and the default perspective
    Welcome
